title: Idea: Keen Style adventure game!! :)
content: I don't know if this is a good idea [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-stunned.gif[/img] but could someone make a Keen adventure?[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-confused.gif[/img] game I already saw C.K.R.O.N. (Commander Keen in Realality On the Norm), Can someone make an other?[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-confused.gif[/img] [img]http://images.ucomics.com/comics/ga/2005/ga050705.gif[/img]

title: Re: Idea: Keen Style adventure game!! :)
content:
I started making one once but didn't get far. I'll actually make one if I can be bothered to learn AGS scripting.-----
[img]http://gnosticus.spatang.com/PBF056BCPuppyWish.jpg[/img]

title: Re: Idea: Keen Style adventure game!! :)
content:
originally my Keen and Sonic crossover fan fic series Dimension Chaos started out was actually planned to be a lucasarts styled adventure game. I then turned it into a fic because 1)too much action to be used as a adventure game and 2) I suck at learning AGS. Besides I feel its better off being a fan fic and the story has grown so much since then spawning the series to be turned into a 5 part series. Still I do have an idea for a plot for a original Keen adventure game thats a prequel to the first game that tells the story of how Billy actually became Keen. I'd love expand this plot and put it in a fan game. The end is near. An evil force returns. And only Commander Keen can stop him, but this time he must team up with a super sonic hedgehog and a two tailed fox. Follow the adventure:[url=http://www.geocities.com/superadammario/chaos.html]Dimension Chaos[/url]
A Commander Keen and Sonic The Hedgehog Crossover Fan Fiction

Visit my website at [url=http://www.geocities.com/superadammario]www.geocities.com/superadammario[/url]

title: Re: Idea: Keen Style adventure game!! :)
content:
Ideas are all very well, but we have too many of them and not enough end products. Why not try to learn how to use AGS and create one of your own? A program called [url=http://adventuremaker.com/]Adventure Maker[/url] is probably easier to use - me and my friend used it at the age of 9 to create a funny little adventure game called Big American Pie. The graphics were done with Paint, though.
My [url=http://kevan.org/brain.cgi?grafix5000]MindBending Power[/url] is 5.43 points.
Possibly the [url=http://legion.gibbering.net/misterx/troutwar.php?s=grafix5000]funniest thing[/url] on the interweb.
Go to [url=http://www.toxicsheep.com]www.toxicsheep.com[/url] to see my site!

[img]http://www.toxicsheep.com/sigs/scrobblersig.php[/img]

title: Re: Idea: Keen Style adventure game!! :)
content: I really don't understand how to use it.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dead.gif[/img] [img]http://images.ucomics.com/comics/ga/2005/ga050705.gif[/img]

title: Re: Idea: Keen Style adventure game!! :)
content:
Often understanding doesn't happen in one hour..

Anyways, like that idea Superadammario64. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] Would be interesting as fan fiction as well (or as anything)..

As well, I don't personally prefer games that are just slapped up with quickly and badly made graphics. Nothing's wrong with Paint made graphics (see XkyKeen1-3), but often when someone that can't draw uses Paint (or any other program) the graphics suck. I don't want to see quickly made crap in Keen fan games..You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: Idea: Keen Style adventure game!! :)
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]As well, I don't personally prefer games that are just slapped up with quickly and badly made graphics. Nothing's wrong with Paint made graphics (see XkyKeen1-3), but often when someone that can't draw uses Paint (or any other program) the graphics suck. I don't want to see quickly made crap in Keen fan games..[hr][/quote]

Then thank god I'm not making fan games anymore since I suck at art [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dead.gif[/img]
Yeah my idea could work as a fan fic but since I'm so determined in getting dimension chaos finished I doubt I would ever get that done.The end is near. An evil force returns. And only Commander Keen can stop him, but this time he must team up with a super sonic hedgehog and a two tailed fox.
